message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $180.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Can you meet me at that price?
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that $120 is a good price for you, but I was thinking more along the lines of $160. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell it to you for $160.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I can do $140, can you meet me at that price?

I understand that you're trying to stay within your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession. I can sell it to you for $155, which is a bit higher than your offer, but still a good compromise.
I appreciate your willingness to make a concession, but I'm still not comfortable with $155. I can do $145, can you meet me at that price?

I understand that you're trying to get the best deal, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession. I can sell it to you for $152.50, which is a bit higher than your offer, but still a good compromise.
I appreciate your willingness to make another concession, but I'm still not comfortable with $152.50. I can do $142, can you meet me at that price?
I'm starting to get a bit concerned that we're not going to meet in the middle, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I can sell it to you for $148, but that's as low as I'm willing to go.

I appreciate your final concession, but I'm still not willing to pay $148. I'm willing to walk away from the deal and buy it from John for $120. I'm not going to go any higher than $140. Can you meet me at that price?
